sense.def:
A conclusion
je nekaj, za kar po pazljivem razmišljanju sklenemo, da je res.

seg.quote: I came to the conclusion that I didn't really like civil engineering.

sense.def:
The conclusion of something
je dokončanje nečesa.

seg.quote: We tried an experiment which had an interesting conclusion.

sense.def:
Z izrazom
a foregone conclusion
lahko opišemo nekaj, kar se bo gotovo zgodilo.
